item.title: Azure DevOps Pipelines with multiple schedules
item.description: Azure DevOps Pipelines with multiple schedules Context A client is aware that significant cost savings could be realised by a scheduled manipulation of some of their deployed resources and services. Their working week leads to predictable hot and cold periods in the utilisation of their build services and pre-production environments in which scaling up and down could take place. The resources in question don’t have any other suitable means to scale based on demand.
